title: Enhancing Business Practical Competencies: Optimizing Wireless Network Latency Management via Machine Learning Approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of network principles and intermediate-level knowledge of data communication, with awareness of fundamental machine learning concepts
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can analyze causes of latency issues (e.g., bufferbloat) in wireless network environments and explain diagnostic methods.
Learners can understand the principles of reinforcement learning-based queue management techniques (LearnQueue) and apply them to real-world network scenarios.
Learners can design dynamic buffer size adjustment strategies tailored to diverse application requirements (real-time communication/bulk data transfer).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
